1.name: fire bolt
1.effect: Hurl a molt of fire. Make a Soul Attack against a target within Throw Range 6. On hit give the target 1 stack of Burn for every 4 Soul Strain you have (rounded down). On a Low Roll give the target 1 stack of Burn for every 5 Soul Strain instead of every 4 (rounded down). On a High Roll give the target 1 stack of Burn for every 3 Soul Strain instead of every 4 (rounded down).

2.name: poprocks
2.effect: Turn a rock into a little explosive. Make a Soul Attack against a target within Throw Range 6. Push the creature back (Knockback) 1 tile plus an additional 1 tile for every 2 Soul Strain you have (rounded up). On a Low Roll it is an additional 1 tile for every 3 Soul Strain instead of every 2. On a High Roll it is an additional tile for every Soul Strain you have instread of ever 2.

3.name: water whip
3.effect: Make a Soul Attack against a creature within Range 6. Do 1 damage for every 4 Soul Strain you currently have (rounded down). On a Low Roll do 1 damage for every 5 Soul Strain you have instead of every 4 (rounded down). On a High Roll do 1 damage for every 3 Soul Strain you have instead of every 4 (rounded down).

4.name: spark
4.effect: Create a spark between two fingers which can ignite flammable objects. Alternatively you can make a Soul Attack against a creature within Melee Range. Deals 1 damage for every 2 Strain you currently have. On a Low Roll do 1 damage for every 3 Soul Strain you have instead of every 2. On a High Roll do 1 damage for every Soul Strain you have instead of every 2.

5.name: glow
5.effect: Touch an object to make it glow. It illuminates 2 tiles around it. Lasts until dispelled or you cast Glow on another object. This spell can be increased with more Soul Strain to illuminate more tiles. (Some items/weapons grant this spell with increased radius)

6.name: far whispers
6.effect: Target a Creature you can see. Whisper a message no longer than 10 seconds long. The target, and only your target, will hear your whisper regardless of distance.

7.name: bertle’s ball
7.effect: You Focus on creating a small ball, which can be no bigger than your palm or smaller than a marble. The ball glows slightly giving it a faint outline for you even through walls. You are always able to see the ball, even through walls. (This lets you cast spells that require line of sight in places you cant see.)

8.name: pocket dimension
8.effect: Create a small hole in space from a container you are touching that is no larger than 1 tile in size. The space is 1 tile square of empty space accessible through the opening of the container. Every time you cast this spell it connects to the same space regardless of container. Only you can access this space, and if you die its contents are scattered throught the planes. This effect lasts for 3 turns.

9.name: minor illusion
9.effect:
Focus on creating a visual or non-verbal sound Illusion of your choice that is no larger in size than 1 foot square within Range 6. A creature can make a Core Roll against you to discern if it is an illusion.
The illusion lasts for 3 turns, until dispelled, you cast another Focused spell, or you loose Focus. You can spend an additional dice on the following turns to animate the illusion, resetting the number of turns until it dispels.

10.name: control elements
10.effect:
You can change the general shape and temperature of Earth, Air, Fire, and Water up to a maximum of 1 cubic tile. 
Some examples are being able to freeze water, ignite or snuff out small fires, dry wet objects or creatures, make air pockets in water, and remove grime from surfaces.

11.name: phantom fishing rod
11.effect: This spell counts as a Fishing rod for the purposes of Fishing (See Items). Target a creature within Range 6, increase this range by 1 for every 4 Soul Strain you have (rounded down). Pull a light object to you or if you target a large object or creature make a Soul Attack. On hit pull the target 3 tiles to you. On a Low Roll pull the target 2 tiles to you instead of 3. On a High Roll pull the target 4 tiles instead of 3.

12.name: flame claw
12.effect: Make a Soul Attack against a target within Melee Range. On hit, give the target 2 Burn. On a Low Roll give the target 1 stack of Burn instead of 2. On a High Roll give the target 3 stacks of Burn instead of 2.

13.name: root trap
13.effect:
You Focus on making an area within Range 8 into a root trap. The area covers 2 tiles around it (Burst 2). Any target that enters the area will be attacked by Roots. All targets that enter or start their turn in the area for the first time must make a Body Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. On failure, the target is Grappled until the start of their next turn and takes 1 damage.
This effect lasts for 3 turns, until dispelled, you cast another Focused spell, or you take damage.

14.name: water ball
14.effect: Create a water ball about 1 ft in diameter. You can then make a Soul Attack against a target within Range 8. On hit the target gets knocked back 4 tiles, and they get 4 stacks of Wet. On a Low Roll they get knocked back 3 tiles and gain 2 stacks of Wet instead. On a High Roll they get knocked back 5 tiles and gain 6 stacks of Wet instead.

15.name: spectral parachute
15.effect:
You and up to 4 other creatures of your choosing within Range 6 slow your falling to 4 tiles a round. While spell is active all targets cannot take fall damage.
This effect lasts for 6 rounds, or until dispelled.

16.name: bless
16.effect: Touch an Object or Creature. If cast on water it becomes Holy Water. If cast on a Creature they cannot be Cursed for 1 hour. If cast on a weapon the weapon does an extra 1 damage to Undead. Can be cast on a dead body to prevent it from being resurrected as an Undead.

17.name: dark burst
17.effect: Make a Soul Attack against a target within Range 8. Do 2 damage, and the target gains 1 stack of Blind. On a Low Roll the target does not gain a stack of Blind. On a High Roll the target gains 2 stacks of Blind instead.

18.name: cube
18.effect:
You can Focus on creating a Spectral Cube within 6 tiles of you. The cube can be up to 1 tile long on any side. The cube has 6 health.
The cube goes away after 1 minute (6 turns), if you dispel it, you cast another Focused spell, the cube dies, or you take damage.

19.name: spirit walk
19.effect: Touch a willing Creature. You make the target Incorporeal and reduce the creature’s speed by 2 until the start of your next turn.

20.name: healing hands
20.effect: Touch a Creature, cannot target undead or constructs. Heal the target for half of your Medicine rounded up.

21.name: sleeping powder
21.effect: Put creatures into a magical slumber. Target a number of Creatures you can see within 8 tiles who’s combined Health total is up to or less than the sum of the dice given +3 (Armor Health does not count as Health). You cannot target undead or constructs. These creatures are forcefully put to sleep for 3 turns. These creatures wake up if another creature spends ## (2 dice) to wake them or they take damage.

22.name: quick repair
22.effect: Touch a broken item or Construct. Repair the target for half of your Crafting rounded up. This can repair Armor up to half your Crafting rounded up per cast.

23.name: lightshow
23.effect: Burst 2 centered on a target within 8 tiles. All targets within this area must make a Soul Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. On failure, creatures gain 2 stacks of Blind. On success creatures gain 1 stack of Blind instead.

24.name: smite
24.effect: Make a Weapon Attack. On hit do an extra 2 Damage. If the target was Undead do an extra 3 Damage instead.

25.name: sponge
25.effect: Pick an area of liquid within 6 tiles.  Remove an amount of liquid no larger than 2 cubic tiles of liquid, banishing it to a random demi plane. This can target Wet targets, removing all stacks of Wet on them.

26.name: conjure fog
26.effect:
Focus on creating an area of fog centered on a tile you can see within 8 tiles. You then summon a dense fog within Burst 3 centered on this tile. Creatures in this area can't see past 1 tile in front of them and lose 2 dice when doing ranged attacks or spells in the area.
The fog lasts 3 turns, until dispelled, you cast another Focused spell, or you loose Focus.

27.name: predict
27.effect: Roll 3 dice and Lock one of them.

28.name: soul shard
28.effect: Make a Soul Attack against a target within Range 8. On hit the target takes 2 damage, and the next time you cast this spell on the same target add 1 to one of the dice spent casting this spell. On a Low Roll you do not get the bonus to the next cast of this spell on the target. On a High Roll you may add 2 instead of 1 to the next cast.

29.name: fire breath
29.effect: Breath a Cone of flame outward Range 3. Ignite all flammable objects within this area. All targets within this area must make a Mind Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. On failure, give the Creature Burn 3. On success, give the Creature Burn 2.

30.name: boulder toss
30.effect: Burst 2 centered on a target within 8 tiles. All targets within this area must make a Soul Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. On failure, the target takes 3 damage and is knocked back 2 tiles. On success, the target takes 2 damage and is knocked back 1 tile.

31.name: freezing wave
31.effect: Breath a Cone of ice outward Range 3. Freeze all liquids within this area making it. All targets within this area must make a Body Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. On failure, give the target 2 stacks of Stun. On success, give the target 1 stack of Stun. Wet targets get an additional 2 stacks of Stun.

32.name: lightning
32.effect: Range 6, make a Ray to a point within range. All targets within this area must make a Mind Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. On failure, deal 3 damage. On success, deal 2 damage. Deals an extra damage to Constructs and Wet Creatures.

33.name: purge
33.effect: Attempt to purge a Curse/Effect on a creature. Roll a Soul against a Curse or Effect on a creature. If you meet or exceed the target’s value (indicated next to the curse), remove the Curse or Effect. Effects have a value of 4.

34.name: weak curse
34.effect:
Target a Creature or Object within range 6. The target must make a Soul Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. If they fail, give the target one of the following Curses. The curse does not go away until dispelled by Purge (must beat the number next to the curse) or the target dies. If this targets an object, the curse can affect anyone who touches the object.
Blind (6): Blind the target.
Weak (6): Reduce Melee Weapon damage by 1 and carrying capacity by half.
Paranoia (6): Someone always seems to be watching. Roll Thieving with 2 less dice, and are Marked for the duration of the Curse.

35.name: pillar
35.effect:
You can Focus on creating a Spectral Pillar within 6 tiles of you. The pillar can be up to 1 tile long on any side and up to 3 tiles tall. The pillar has 9 health. If a pillar is made under a creature that creature is pushed up to the top of the pillar. If a creature cannot be lifted (from hitting a ceiling) then the creature takes knockback damage.
The pillar goes away after 1 minute (6 turns), if you dispel it, you cast another Focused spell, the pillar dies, or you take damage.

36.name: conjure spectral claws
36.effect:
Focus on conjuring a set of Spectral Claws (See weapons). On cast you can do an Attack.  These claws do damage based on your Soul. On a Low Roll you do 1 less damage. On a High Roll you give the creature a stack of Soul Strain.
The claws go away after 6 turns, if you dispel it, you cast another Focused spell, or you take damage.

37.name: healing drop
37.effect: Target a Creature you can see within 8 tiles. You cannot target undead or constructs. Heal the target for half of your Medicine rounded up.

38.name: invisibility
38.effect:
You Focus on giving a Creature Invisibility for 10 minutes. You can increase the number of targeted Creatures by gaining 1 extra Soul Strain per creature. 
The Invisibility goes away early if the creature takes or does damage, you dispel the Invisibility, you cast another Focused spell, or you loose Focus.

39.name: soul skip
39.effect: Teleport to a location that you can see up to your Speed away.

40.name: ice knife
40.effect: Create a Knife made of Ice. This knife does an extra damage and breaks after 3 turns or if thrown. On cast you can do an Attack.

41.name: beast bond
41.effect:
Make a Nature Contest against a beast creature within 4 tiles of you. On Success the beast becomes friendly to you and neutral to any creature that hasn't harmed it. 
You can control up to your level of personal minions with your dice, but they must all be given the same Command. If the beast is not given any commands it does not do any action. When you spend a dice to move you may also have the beast move as well.
This effect lasts until you harm the beast, you cast this spell again, dismiss the spell, or the beast dies. When the spell ends the beast will react based on how you treated it.

42.name: fog light
42.effect:
Focus on summoning a pillar of light from a distant star. The pillar is 4 tiles high and illuminates 2 tiles in a radius around it. It clears any fog within its light. This counts as sunlight. You can spend an additional dice on later turns to move the beam.
The Light lasts for 6 turns, until dispelled, you cast another Focused spell, or you take damage.

43.name: intrusive thoughts
43.effect: Do a contested Soul roll against a creature within range 6. On success, you can implant a thought into the target’s mind. They believe the thought was their own and have no memory of the magic. On failure, they know you tried to cast magic on them but not what the spell was.

44.name: create illusion
44.effect:
Focus on creating a visual or non-verbal sound Illusion of your choice that is no larger in size than 1 tile square. Range 6. A creature can make a Core Roll against you to discern if it is an illusion.
The illusion lasts for 3 turns, until dispelled, you cast another Focused spell, or you take damage. You can spend a dice on the following turns to animate the illusion (no extra SS cost), resetting the number of turns until it dispels.

45.name: flesh shaper
45.effect:
You alter the body of another creature with the aid of runes. By spending 10 minutes writing runes on yourself or others, you can grant a creature one of the benefits listed below. Each creature can only have 1 rune alteration and the rune’s used for the change are visible somewhere on the body (can be hidden with clothing). This effect lasts for up to 1 hour or until the runes are removed.
Wings: Change the creatures arms to resemble wings. The creature is able to glide 2 tiles for every 1 tile it would fall. This effect does not work if it is hindered in any way (Stunned, Burning, Grappled, ext.)
Gills/Fins: Change the creature to be better in the water. The creature can breath underwater without needing air, and it can swim it’s Speed.
Change Appearance: Physically alter the creatures body to look like another’s. You can change sex, height, race, and appearance. This does not change the creatures Race Trait.

46.name: soul slash
46.effect: Make a Soul Melee Attack against a target. On hit, give the creature 4 Soul Strain. On a Low Roll the target gains 3 Soul Strain instead of 4. On a High Roll give the target 5 Soul Strain instead of 4.

47.name: weightless
47.effect:
Focus on making a target weightless. If the target is unwilling, do a Soul Contest against them. The target is no longer tied down by gravity and can move in air as though it was Water (Swim).
This effect lasts for 6 turns, until dispelled, you cast another Focused spell, or you loose Focus.

48.name: soul shield
48.effect: Range 3. Give a Creature Ward 1. You cannot have more than 3 Ward at a time.

49.name: shockwave
49.effect: Burst 2 centered on yourself. All targets within this area, other than yourself, must make a Body Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. On failure, Knock them back 6 tiles (Knockback 6). On success, Knock them back 2 tiles (Knockback 2).

50.name: butter fingers
50.effect: Do a Soul Contest against a target within Range 6. On failure, the target cannot use their hands to manipulate or grasp objects or surfaces and fails any checks made to do so, until the end of your next turn. In addition they drop any items they are holding.

51.name: soul chains
51.effect:
Make a Soul Contest against a creature within Range 6. On Failure the creature is grappled. You can spend an additional dice each turn to pull the creature 3 tiles to you. If the creature tries to escape they need to do a Contested Soul roll instead of Body.
The chains last for 1 minute (6 turns), until dispelled, you cast another Focused spell, or you take damage.

52.name: detect magic
52.effect:
You Focus on the waves of Soul around you. Objects/Creatures affected by magic glow a set color based on what class of spell is affecting it..
This effect lasts for 6 turns, until dispelled, you cast another Focused spell, or you take damage.

53.name: dispel magic
53.effect: Target a creature or object being effected by magic within Range 4. Reduce the spells duration by the dice given. If the magic has no duration it is instead dispelled as if the owner dispelled it. Magic items or runes are nullified until the time runs out.

54.name: wall of thorns
54.effect:
You Focus on summoning a wall of thorns within Range 5. When you do a wall of damaging thorns appears in the spot. The wall is 5 tiles long, has 10 Health, and any creature that touches the wall takes 2 damage.
The wall lasts for 6 turns, until dispelled, you cast another Focused spell, or you loose Focus.

55.name: rain
55.effect: You call a rain cloud to form in the sky above you. Choose a point within Range 8. A burst of rain covers 3 tiles around it (Burst 3). Anything in that area gets 6 stacks of Wet.

56.name: lightning strike
56.effect: Make a Soul Attack against a target within Range 8. You may add 1 to one of the dice spent casting this spell if the target is wearing metal. On hit the target takes 4 damage. Deals an extra damage to Constructs and wet Creatures. On a Low roll do 1 less damage. On a high roll do half damage to a target agasent from your target.

57.name: debuff barrier
57.effect: Target a creature within Range 6. Remove all stacks of one of the following: Stunned, Webbed, Blinded, Burning, Marked, or Poisoned. If this is cast on a creature that has no stacks they block the next instance of gaining one of these stacks. This effect lasts for 12 hours.

58.name: raise undead
58.effect:
Target a dead creature. Curse that creature turning them into a Zombie (DR 1). 
You can control up to your level of personal minions with your dice, but they must all be given the same Command. If the Zombie is not given any commands it does not do any action. When you spend a dice to move you may also have the Zombie move as well.

59.name: dome
59.effect:
You can Focus on creating a Spectral Dome within 6 tiles of you. The dome can be up to 3 tiles in radius (6 diameter). The dome has 15 health and 15 Armor Health. While being made if a creature would be inside the dome’s shape it is not affected by the creation. Creatures and objects cannot move through the dome once made.
The dome goes away after 1 hour, if you dispel it, you cast another Focused spell, the dome dies, or you loose Focus.

60.name: ghost
60.effect:
Touch a willing Creature, cannot target undead or constructs. You Focus on making the target Incorporeal for 1 minute (6 turns). The creature has 2 less Speed while Incorporeal.
This effect goes away early if you dispel it, you cast another Focused spell, or you loose Focus.

61.name: healing bloom
61.effect: Burst 1 centered on a target within 8 tiles. All targets within this area are healed for half of your Medicine rounded up. Does not affect Undead or Constructs.

62.name: mood swing
62.effect: Do a contested Soul roll against a creature within Range 6. On success, you forcibly change their mood to one you specify. This may stop them from fighting or may help incite fights. They believe the thought was their own and have no memory of the magic. On failure, they know you tried to cast magic on them but not what the spell was.

63.name: winds grace
63.effect:
Touch a creature. Focus on giving that creature 2 Speed. 
The spells effects go away after 1 hour, if you dispel it, you cast another Focused spell, or you loose Focus.

64.name: prop
64.effect: You Focus on turning into a simple non-magical inanimate prop that is no smaller than a cup or larger than yourself. While in this form you have 3 Armor health and 1 Health. If you move or loose this Health the spell ends early. You can be moved by other creatures without loosing this effect. If you are put in a position you would not fit in when you become normal you are shunted out of that space taking knockback damage equal to how far you are shunted. See Mysc Rules - Prop for weird use ruling.

65.name: swapper
65.effect: Swap places with a creature you can see within Range 8. If the creature is unwilling do a Soul Contest. On success both creatures teleport to each others location.

66.name: counterspell
66.effect: Spend your Locked dice to cast. You counter a spell that you can see being cast within Range 6 that has a strain cost less than or equal to the locked dice value. This can be cast on another creatures turn.

67.name: fireball
67.effect: Burst 2 centered on a target within 8 tiles. All targets within this area must make a Mind Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. On failure, gives 4 Burn. On success, gives 3 Burn.

68.name: chain lightning
68.effect: Pick a target within Range 6. Make a Soul Attack against that target. Pick another target within Range 4 of that Target, the lightning jumps to that target damaging them as well. You can do this up to 2 times. On hit, deals 4 damage. Deals 1 extra damage to Constructs and wet Creatures. On a Low Roll the Lightning jumps 1 time instead of 2. On a High Roll the lightning jumps 3 times instead of 2.

69.name: curse
69.effect:
Target a Creature or Object within range 6. The target must make a Soul Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. If they fail, give the target one of the following Curses. The curse does not go away until dispelled by Purge (must beat the number next to the curse) or the target dies. If this targets an object, the curse can affect anyone who touches the object.
Decay (6,5): Increases aging by 2 weeks per day. (14 years older in 1 year)
Woe (6,5): Roll with 1 less dice on all rolls.
Clumsy (6,5): Roll a dice whenever you move. On a 2 or less, fall over ending your movement for that dice.

70.name: stepping stones
70.effect: Gain an amount of teleport equal to twice your Speed. You can then Teleport to a location that you can see up to a total of this teleport away. You can break up this teleportation into any number of “steps” where you can do other actions. If you do not use up all of the teleportation by the end of your turn you loose the remaining steps.

71.name: wings of mercy
71.effect: Teleport to a Creature (other than yourself) that is on Deaths Door, that you can see up to twice your Speed away. Heal the target for half of your Medicine rounded up.

72.name: greater illusion
72.effect:
Focus on creating a visual or non-verbal sound Illusion of your choice that is no larger in size than 3 tiles square. Range 6. A creature can make a Core Roll against you to discern if it is an illusion.
The illusion lasts for 3 turns, until dispelled, you cast another Focused spell, or you take damage. You can spend subsequent actions on the following turns to animate the illusion (no extra cost), resetting the number of turns until it dispels.

73.name: soul bind
73.effect:
Target a Creature or Object within range 6. The target must make a Soul Roll against the sum of the 3 dice given when casting. If they fail, give the target the following Curse. The curse goes away after 1 minute (6 turns), if dispelled by Purge (must beat the number next to the curse) or the target dies. 
Soul Shackled (6,5): When the caster of this curse takes damage the cursed target takes the same amount of damage (before accounting for Armor).

74.name: deja vu
74.effect: Do a contested Mind roll against a creature within range 6. On success, you make the creature forget the last 5 minutes. They believe the thought was their own and have no memory of the magic. On failure, they know you tried to cast magic on them but not what the spell was.

75.name: summon guiding sprite
75.effect:
Focus on Summoning a Guiding Sprite within 3 tiles of you, when you first summon the sprite pick an element: Fire, Water, Earth, Wind, Light, or Dark. By using a dice on later turns, or when the Sprite is Summoned you may have it tether to a creature of your choice within 3 tiles of the sprite. At the beginning of your turn or when first tethered the sprite gives one of the following effects based on what element you summoned it as:
Fire: The creature looses all stacks of Wet and cannot gains 1 less stacks of Wet when given stacks while the sprite is tethered.
Water: The creature Gains a stack of Wet, and cannot have less than 1 stack of Wet while the sprite it tethered.
Earth: Gain 1 Armor Health. This Armor Health goes away when the sprite leaves.
Wind: You have no need to breathe while tethered. This stops Poisson gas, and drowning.
Light: Remove all stacks of Blind. The sprite illuminates 2 tiles around itself while tethered.
Dark: Become Invisible, this Invisibility stops when you move or do damage.
The sprite lasts for 10 minutes, if you dispel it, you cast another Focused spell, or you loose Focus.
